siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Guide towards independence
frontmatter.description: Identify areas that will help most and work towards an enduring solution.

frontmatter.title: Diligently appreciate opportunities
frontmatter.description: Three friends passed this year and did not make it to see age 38. Simply living is an opportunity to experience life.

frontmatter.title: Respect the agency of individuals
frontmatter.description: Allow others to live with agency.

frontmatter.title: There's no value in complaining about weather
frontmatter.description: We can't control nor change the weather. We can predict. We can prepare. We can respond accordingly.

frontmatter.title: Consider response to others actions
frontmatter.description: It's not possible to control others actions. It is possible to control the response to those actions.

frontmatter.title: Build for long term not immediate response
frontmatter.description: Others should not be expected to appreciate the work that went into building, nor the potential. Build with the right structure so it can spread. Don't worry if it's not immediate.

frontmatter.title: Find balance to keep moving
frontmatter.description: Find a balance with physical actions and mental awareness. Keep going to maintain balance.

frontmatter.title: Speak more about enduring themes
frontmatter.description: Spend more time considering enduring themes rather than speaking about specific current events.

frontmatter.title: Speak your mind in a tactful manner
frontmatter.description: In order to effectively communicate, be tactful about the message and how it is communicated.

frontmatter.title: Listen to feedback shape future projects
frontmatter.description: Use feedback wisely. Learn to decipher what others are saying to help shape the course of future projects.
